fullplot: It's Friday night in Asuncièn, Paraguay and the temperature is sweltering. Vèctor, a 17-year-old wheelbarrow delivery boy, dreams of becoming famous and covets a fancy cellular phone in the infamous Mercado 4. He's offered a chance to deliver seven boxes with unknown contents in exchange for a quick US$100. But what sounds like an easy job soon gets complicated. Something in the boxes is highly coveted and Vèctor and his pursuers quickly find themselves caught up in a crime they know nothing about.
plot: Vèctor receives an unusual proposal, to carry 7 boxes of unknown content through the Market Number 4 but things get complicated along the way.
title: 7 Boxes
